verbose_text: " PPARalpha activation increases the secretion of apoliopoprotein B-100 (apo B-100), which is the main structural protein of VLDL, and upregulates the expression of liver fatty acid binding protein (LFABP) which is essential for the secretion of apo B-100 [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
